main event: A whitish light was observed moving in a NE direction in St. Louis, Missouri on July 13, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting was categorized as ground-visual observation., The object was presumed to be a craft that landed 10 miles after it was first sighted., The whitish light faded from view as it moved in the NE direction., The report concluded that the object could have been a balloon, aircraft, or other astronomical phenomena., The document is part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings.
sighted object: whitish light moving in the NE direction
